title: Lentil shepherd's pie
ingredients: ['3 large potatoes, peeled and diced', '250g red split lentils (washed)', '500ml Vegetable stock', 'splash of white wine', '2 large carrots, chopped', '2 sticks of celery, chopped', '1/2 an onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic', '50g butter', '2 tsp tomato puree', 'salt and pepper to taste']
